name: Gun Fight!
description:
Supports controller inputs!

Controls -- Player 1:
WASD to move, QE to aim, spacebar to fire, H to restart

Controls -- Player 2:
Numpad 8456 to move, Numpad 79 to aim, down arrow to fire, H to restart

Controller Inputs (Both Players):
Left stick to move, right stick to aim, triggers to fire
